divs: Sighting Detailsvery clear, sunny day. Was outside on my deck when I noticed alot of jets streaking across the sky leaving trails. (See attached photo for reference of this description.) I noticed that to the left of the sun, there appeared to be a "rainbow-type" spot in the sky, and to the left of that appeared to be a shrouded, dome-shaped object that the jets were flying toward. Ran in, grabbed my camera, and snapped this picture of the jets approaching the object (to the left of he sun). I know the small blue dots are "flare" from the sunlight.........but the orb is NOT.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Flushing
There were no other sightings in Flushing on or around November 19th 2012
Summary: strange-looking fluorescent dome-shaped object in sky with 2 jets approaching
